name: Escape from Greyrock
description:
You are a prisoner in Greyrock Prison, one of the toughest jails in all the Cestreyan Empire. Why are you there? Were you a thief turned in by a rival? A murderer betrayed by the love of your life? Are you actually innocent? In fact, what's your gender, character class, personality and sexual and political preference? Decide all of these things for yourself as you break free and journey through the land of Efrania.

Decide what kind of person you want to be
Decisions and dialogue choices made in-game decide your characters past, present and future. Play as exactly the kind of person you want to be.

Choose your friends (and enemies)
There are several companions to travel with, but Efrania is a polarised place, engulfed in civil war and ancient intrigue. Based on your actions some potential friends may become deadly enemies and vice-versa.

Define your story
With multiple pathways through the game, no two play-throughs are going to be the same. The game features six different endings with endless variations of each, taking all of your previous actions into account.

Fight all the monsters!
The game features over 80 different types of monster, spread across hundreds of encounters. Each one has its own quirks, so be sure to learn their strengths and weaknesses.

100% Original Artwork
All of the artwork used in the game is 100% original, so you won't have seen any of it before!

Music by Hiroki Kikuta (Secret of Mana)
Featuring amazing music by Hiroki Kikuta from his "The Calm" and "The Fury" music packs.
